DOC.brief_summary: Standard method colonoscopy insert colonoscope rapidly reach cecum , careful inspection polypectomy withdrawal phase . However , small polyp ( e.g . < 1cm ) see insertion phase difficult find withdrawal phase . Also , colon different conformation insertion withdrawal phase . We think careful inspection polypectomy insertion withdrawal improve adenoma detection rate .
DOC.brief_title: Adenoma Detection Polypectomy During Both Insertion Withdrawal
DOC.criteria: Patient undergo screen surveillance colonoscopy Previous colorectal resection , Polyposis syndrome , Inflammatory bowel disease
